title: Datadog
description: Widely known for its extensive integrations, real-time dashboards, and full-stack observability (infrastructure, application performance, logs, etc.).

title: New Relic
description: An all-in-one observability platform with a generous free tier, making it attractive for both large companies and startups. It's particularly strong in Application Performance Monitoring (APM).

title: Dynatrace
description: Known for its AI-powered automation and deep observability. It automatically discovers and maps your entire cloud environment.

title: Splunk
description: A powerful platform for collecting, analyzing, and monitoring machine-generated data. It's a go-to for complex log management and security monitoring.

title: LogicMonitor
description: A SaaS-based platform that provides comprehensive visibility into complex IT infrastructure, especially for hybrid cloud environments.

title: Amazon CloudWatch
description: The native monitoring and observability service for all AWS resources. It provides actionable insights to optimize application performance and manage resource utilization.

title: Google Cloud Operations
description: The integrated suite for monitoring, logging, and tracing applications and infrastructure on Google Cloud Platform (formerly Stackdriver).

title: Azure Monitor
description: Microsoft's solution for collecting, analyzing, and acting on telemetry data from your Azure and on-premises environments.

title: Prometheus
description: An open-source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit built for dynamic cloud environments and microservices. It's often paired with Grafana for visualization.

title: Grafana
description: An open-source data visualization and analytics tool that connects to a wide variety of data sources, including Prometheus. It is a key component of the 'Grafana Stack' for observability.

title: Zabbix
description: A free and open-source enterprise-class monitoring solution that can be used for network, server, and application monitoring.

title: Nagios
description: A highly customizable open-source monitoring system known for its alerting capabilities for servers, applications, and services.

title: SolarWinds
description: Offers a suite of IT management and monitoring tools, including solutions for network performance, servers, and applications.

title: Site24x7
description: A cost-effective, all-in-one monitoring solution for websites, servers, and cloud infrastructure.

title: Sematext
description: An all-in-one monitoring and logging solution with a strong focus on real-time visibility.

title: AppDynamics
description: A platform with a strong focus on APM and correlating IT performance with business metrics.
